aston.group20.model

Interface IAircraft

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<IAircraft>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aircraft, CommercialAircraft, Glider, LightAircraft, PoweredAircraft, UnpoweredAircraft

    public interface IAircraft
extends java.lang.Comparable<IAircraft>
    The IAircraft class defines the functionality that all Aircrafts share, including both the currently implemented Powered and Unpowered Aircraft classes.
    Version:
    1.0, March 2014
    Author:
    Group_20

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getFuelLevel()
      This method returns the Aircrafts fuel level.
      int getID()
      This method returns the Aircrafts unique ID.
      int getLandingTime()
      This method returns the Aircrafts landing time.
      int getMaintenanceTime()
      This method returns the amount of time it takes to repair an Aircraft.
      int getTakeoffTime()
      This method returns the Aircrafts takeoff time.
      int getWaitingTime()
      This method returns the Aircrafts waiting time.
      void incrementMaintenanceTime()
      This method increments the Aircrafts maintenance time field.
      void incrementWaitingTime()
      This method increments the Aircrafts waiting time field.
      boolean isBrokeDown()
      This method returns whether or not the Aircraft is broken down.
      boolean isCrashed()
      This method returns whether or not the Aircraft has crashed.
      boolean isFlying()
      Ths method returns whether or not the Aircraft is flying (or on the ground).
      void setBrokeDown(boolean brokeDown)
      This method either sets the Aircraft to broken down from normal.
      void setIsFlying(boolean isFlying)
      This method allows the recipient to set whether or not the Aircraft is in the air/flying, and thus landing/taking off.
      void setWaitingTime(int waitingTime)
      This method sets the waiting time of the Aircraft.
      void step()
      The step method defines the Actions that Aircraft take.

        void setBrokeDown(boolean brokeDown)
        This method either sets the Aircraft to broken down from normal. or from broken down to normal.
        Parameters:
